tool_description: This API helps you extract entities quickly from large texts.
name: Advanced NER
title: Advanced NER

api_list.name: extract
api_list.description: Send a text in the body, and get the extracted entities from it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://advanced-ner.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "advanced-ner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://advanced-ner.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "advanced-ner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
